name: udhr
description: Universal Declaration of Human Rights (Unicode) in plain-text and JSON
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test.js
scripts.lint-api: eslint index.js lib/index.js lib/information.js lib/json.js lib/text.js
scripts.lint-style: jscs index.js lib/index.js lib/information.js lib/json.js lib/text.js script/build-data.js script/normalize-line-endings.js script/build-support.js test.js --reporter=inline
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-script && npm run lint-style
scripts.scrape-data: npm run scrape-data-txt && npm run scrape-data-xml
scripts.unzip-data: npm run unzip-data-txt && npm run unzip-data-xml
scripts.build: npm run scrape-data && npm run unzip-data && npm run build-data && npm run build-support && npm run normalize-line-endings
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
